actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill to amend section 257(e) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Defecit Control Act of 1985 to modify the treatment of losses from asset sales.

summary.text: Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to allow the proceeds from the sale of an asset to be applied to offset the loss of any revenue or receipts resulting from such sale.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 257(e) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Defecit Control Act of 1985 to modify the treatment of losses from asset sales.
